programme.desc: Hawaiili bir aile Aloha Eyaletinde iki aktif volkan arasında yerleşke kurmakta zorlanır. Raneyler etrafı çevrili bir bahçe ve av paravanı kurar.

programme.title: Antika Avcıları
programme.desc: Bizimkilerin yeni dukkanı zararda. Sıkıntılarını hafifletmek için bir muzayedeye katılıyorlar. Ender bir resimli roman kitabı ile kazançlı bir girişim durumu duzeltir mi acaba?.

programme.title: Antika Avcıları
programme.desc: Allen ile Ton zorda olan rehin dukkanlarına mal bulmak için Hollywooda gidiyorlar. Ancak revaçtaki mallarda çetin bir rekabet var. Bu durum işlerini aksatacak mı acaba?.

programme.title: Antika Avcıları
programme.desc: Gosterişli bir ikili artırmada bizimkileri geçiyor. Bu arada, bazı kotu parçalar için aceleyle surulen pey şaşırtıcı sonuçlar doğuruyor. Antika bir parça iyi para getirir mi acaba?.

programme.title: Antika Avcıları
programme.desc: Allen ile Ton, değerli muzayede parçaları aramak için Catalina Islanda gidiyorlar, ama unitelerin az ve zamanlarının kısıtlı olması onların başarısını engelleyecek mi acaba?.

programme.title: İkinci El Kralları
programme.desc: Les, Ashley ve Karenın arasındaki anlaşmazlığı sonlandırmaya çalışıyor. Gitar arayan bir heavy metal grubu dukkâna geliyor.

programme.title: İkinci El Kralları
programme.desc: Seth, spor araba satışını gerçekleştirebilmek için aracı temin etmeye çalışıyor. Tuhaf bir muşteri dukkândan kovuluyor.

programme.title: İkinci El Kralları
programme.desc: Karen, dukkân tanıtımı için portatif bir dalış havuzu kullanmak istiyor. Byron, hokey taraftar urununun sebep olduğu bir kavgaya mudahale ediyor.

programme.title: İkinci El Kralları
programme.desc: Buyuk projesine başlayacak olan Karen başarısız olmaktan korkuyor. Ashley, Lese şaşırtıcı bir ultimatom veriyor.

programme.title: İkinci El Kralları
programme.desc: Detroitin en buyuk rehin dukkânının sahibi olan Gold ailesiyle tanışın. Depoları milyonlarca dolarlık malla dolu ama kâra geçmek için buyuk bir risk almaları gerek.

programme.title: Lezzet Peşinde: Amerika
programme.desc: Tatlı ve tuzlu hamur işleri için fırın ısınıyor! Ev yapımı kızarmış tavuklu sandviç ve Alman usulu çikolatalı tarçınlı kek yapılıyor.

programme.title: Yolda Ne Yiyoruz?
programme.desc: Guy Fieri Indianapoliste soslu goğus etli sandviç, Kaliforniyada Meksika usulu et taramalı atıştırmalıklar ve San Antonioda sucuklu pizza yer.

programme.title: Yolda Ne Yiyoruz?
programme.desc: Guy Fieri, Alabamadaki bir aile lokantasında dumanı tuten Guney işi etler yer. Atlantada Şef G. Garvinin çığır açan et restoranını ziyaret eder.

programme.title: Super Babalar
programme.desc: Taylor trajik bir yangının ardından uç çocuğunu neşelendirmek isteyen bir babanın evinin bahçesine roket temalı bir yapı inşa etmesine yardım eder.

programme.title: Super Babalar
programme.desc: Taylor, dort çocuğunun bahçede oynamasını isteyen bir babayla birlikte hedef tahtaları, kalkan ve bayrakları olan bir bayrak kapmaca kalesi inşa eder.

programme.title: Opal Avcıları: Kızıl Kumlar
programme.desc: Rod ve JC metruk bir elmas madeni uzerinde çalışır. Öksuz bir yavru valabiyi kurtaran Rod ve JC onemli gonulluluk işleri yapmaya başlar.

programme.title: Zıpkın Avcıları
programme.desc: Dort zıpkıncı, dev bir mavi yuzgeçli orkinos için yarışır. Joe ailesini geçindirmek için avlanır. Niko ise tekneyi yonetebileceğini kanıtlamalıdır.

programme.title: Pierce Brosnan ile Buyuk Soygunlar
programme.desc: İki seçkin İtalyan hırsız Antwerp Dunya Elmas Merkezini hedef alır. Değeri 100 milyon doları aşkın elmas, cevher ve nakit ile kayıplara karışırlar.

programme.title: Jeanne dArc
programme.desc: 1429da kuçuk bir Fransız koyunde kendisine ilahi bir mesaj gonderildiğini iddia eden genç bir kız Fransayı duşman guçlerden kurtarır.

programme.title: Kostebek
programme.desc: Bostonda polisin ve suç çetesinin karşılıklı olarak kostebeklerle çalışmaya başlaması olumcul bir kedi-fare oyununa donuşur.

programme.title: Kırsalda Yaşamak Zor
programme.desc: Raney ailesi, kış gelmeden çiftlik kalesini inşa ederek, ucra bir çiftlikteki aileyi çevrede kol gezen bozayılardan korur.

programme.title: Pierce Brosnan ile Buyuk Soygunlar
programme.desc: Mafya bağlantılı hırsızlar 1972de Guney Kaliforniyadaki bir bankayı soyar. Başkan Nixonla bağlantılı olduğu soylenen milyonlarca dolar çalınır.

programme.title: Otoban Takibi
programme.desc: Trafik polisleri Almanyanın dort bir yanındaki magandaların ve hız limitini aşanların peşine duşer. Uzmanlar neyin ozel neyin illegal olduğunu anlar.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Veggie-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Space Adventures
programme.desc: In this childrens cartoon that focuses on animals and other imagined creatures travelling through space, children are encouraged to think creatively, and widen their vocabulary. Duck TV produces content that aids child development, that is both entertaining and educational. Children are encouraged to name objects, improving language, and its very creative, encouraging imaginative thinking.

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Enlightment Corner
programme.desc: This show makes learning fun! As with the majority of Duck TVs productions, this cartoon offers both educational and entertainment benefits. Your little ones will no doubt love following these fun little stories, and will also learn to identify everyday objects along the way, and understand their uses, too. This is essential to their development, and will also help them to gain new skills.

programme.title: Veggie-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.title: Oli - The Cycles of Nature
programme.desc: Give your child a head start, in a way thats fun and exciting, too. Oli the elephant will teach your child to identify objects and their uses in everyday life, develop their thinking and observational skills, and also he will promote an interest in nature. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid the development of young children.

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. This will provide children with a real insight into animals they already know and some that they may not and include facts that are not always provided.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: The Way We Travel
programme.desc: When viewing this cartoon, your child will watch various vehicles, which will, in turn, make them aware of a variety of different shapes and objects in the real world. They will also observe how they operate, which will allow them to grow an understanding of how they may be used in everyday life, as they see their different parts and hear the noises they make.

programme.title: Dance
programme.desc: Come and join the dance party! Get up and get moving with these three adorable characters as they dance around the screen to different songs and tunes. Dance is an excellent way to develop young viewers musical skills, the sense of rhythm and even their listening skills, setting them up for a bright future. And lets be honest, everyone loves to have a good dance.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.desc: Children are encouraged to join in with a range of different dances, building on their coordination and motor skills in the process. This is a Duck TV production. programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.title: Toby McFly
programme.desc: This imaginative and creative childrens animation follows the adventures of Toby McFly, a canine aviator who presents us with a birds eye view of the world. After flying over many fascinating landscapes, active animals, busy people, and interesting places, Toby lands his aircraft and shows us, in detail, what we have just seen from above. The show is educational, stimulating, and informative as well as being fun and entertaining.

programme.title: Connected World
programme.desc: Join the children in this friendly multicultural day-care centre and learn about the diverse heritages of each of the toddlers. Learn where each of the pupils are from and even try to guess their nationalities from their clothing, favourite landmarks and special foods. Help them to narrate the stories and encourage them to be curious about new cultures, languages and countries.

programme.title: Shaping Up

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Join the friendly train conductor and adorable cartoon train as they go on magical journeys and gentle adventures, making sure all of their passengers get taken to the right place at the right time. The short stories are designed to teach your little ones about grouping and categories, using colour, shape, size and purpose to demonstrate this logical task.

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: Small - But Hardworking
programme.desc: Three elves build a variety of different objects with materials such as wood and ice. This show is designed to be both educational and entertaining. It advances childrens imagination, by stimulating their senses with a bright colourful cartoon. Objects coming to life also enhances the focus on promoting creative imagination. This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Albert Explains
programme.desc: Professor Albert uses his incredible knowledge to demonstrate the use of everyday objects, in this Duck TV production. Duck TV aims to produce content thats both entertaining and informative, so that children may learn new skills in a fun and creative way. In this particular skills, the Professor helps children develop their cognotive skills, so that they can grow up to be as clever as him.

programme.title: Higher the Better
programme.desc: Come along with Kiteko the goofy giraffe and Umi the playful meerkat in Higher the Better as they watch the everyday life of toddlers and begin to learn about their everyday adventures! Travelling on field trips and making lots of fun when theyre playing, Higher the Better develops childrens social skills, encourages them to observe and think deeper about what they are watching on their screen.

programme.title: Enlightment Corner
programme.desc: This show makes learning fun! As with the majority of Duck TVs productions, this cartoon offers both educational and entertainment benefits. Your little ones will no doubt love following these fun little stories, and will also learn to identify everyday objects along the way, and understand their uses, too. This is essential to their development, and will also help them to gain new skills.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. This is essential to their development, and will also help them to gain new skills.

programme.title: Cucu, Im here!
programme.desc: Have some fun with the Cucus as they play hide and seek. Cucu, Im here! follows the cucus as they go on lots of adventures, playing games and laughing all day! What better way to improve young viewers cognitive skills, introducing them to object permanence and developing their thinking skills. Cucu, Im here! is the perfect way to have some fun whilst learning something new.

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: DuckSchool
programme.desc: In a forest kindergarden, woodland animals who call it their home are learning the basics of English from their helpful fairy teacher, Miss Sunshine. Learn some brand new words and practice your counting skills, or listen carefully to the stories Miss Sunshine has to tell. With Duckschool we can learn about so many things! There might even be some special guests to meet along the way.

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. Developing babies proper shape-recognition from using vibrant colours a smooth transitions, Shaping Up combines educative aspects so that babies are able to develop their image recognition and creative skills.

programme.title: Sounds Around Us
programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Follow them as they whizz away on exciting adventures together to investigate where different familiar sounds are coming from. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. Deep in the jungle in her cosy chameleon house, Clara uses her colour changing powers for good by helping her wrongly coloured jungles friends and objects to return to their natural colour. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

programme.title: Monica and Rudy 2
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy are here to introduce little children to the concept of rhythm. The familiar duo go on many exciting adventures in which they encounter amazing animals who help them explore the wonderful world of rhythm through their clapping and tapping.

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends
programme.desc: Hubbi and Friends are a group of handymen that embark on a series of exciting adventures on their travels through the countryside. They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.desc: Three elves build a variety of different objects with materials such as wood and ice. This show is designed to be both educational and entertaining. It advances childrens imagination, by stimulating their senses with a bright colourful cartoon. Objects coming to life also enhances the focus on promoting creative imagination. This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.title: Milo Dino
programme.desc: Following the adventures of a curious little dino boy in the Mesosoic era, as he discovers the world around him. Join Milo and his friends and family to find out how dinosaurs lived. The programme helps little children develop their social skills, as well as their imagination, introducing them to the era of dinosaurs.

programme.title: Happy Kingdom
programme.desc: Catching up with the adorable bunnies from Happy Meadows, Happy Kingdom introduces lots more fun characters such like a fearless-knight hedgehog and a caring cook-squirrel. programme.title: Zoo
programme.desc: One friendly zoo keeper wants you to come along and meet all the exciting animals hes looking after, and learn a few things on the way, too! This cartoon for young children, encourages them to recognise and name a variety of animals, acquire basic vocabulary, and associate the sounds animals with the sounds that they make.

programme.title: Sunville - Sportsville

They will also increase muscle strength and sense of balance, which will keep them healthy and happy!

programme.title: Doll Team

The three friends are determined to help the inhabitants of the undergrowth however they can.

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Join the friendly train conductor and adorable cartoon train as they go on magical journeys and gentle adventures, making sure all of their passengers get taken to the right place at the right time. programme.title: World of Toys
programme.desc: Enter a world of games and experience with us fantastic adventures or exercise your fingers and conjure up some exquisite art jewellery. No manuals are needed to do this. Create your own special story and discover new possibilities how to spend a moment together.

programme.title: Small - But Hardworking
programme.desc: Three elves build a variety of different objects with materials such as wood and ice. This show is designed to be both educational and entertaining. programme.title: Ducky and Fluffy

programme.title: Hubbi Will Take Care of It

This cartoon is not only incredibly entertaining, but it promotes problem-solving, and encourages observational and cognitive skills within young children.

programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. Walking around and talking to your child about what you are seeing is the best way for them to learn, but City Life is a great introduction for learning about different everyday places, developing social skills, and introducing toddlers to basic objects.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: India
programme.desc: Want an adventure? Join an Indian boy and his elephant as they travel and explore their own country, visiting the market place and meeting new people! programme.title: Hubbi and Friends

The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

Reinforcing the young viewers knowledge of different animals and developing their vocabulary in a new and fun way, Happy Kingdom is just as educational as it is exciting. Why not get involved and host an animal toy party whilst you watch.

programme.title: Hop-hop
programme.desc: Hop-hop is a cartoon for the littlest viewers of 6 to 36 months old and their families. Its engaging and educational content together with peaceful music and colorful catching picture is very entertaining. Cute Bunnies do everything together- play, eat, brush their teeth, walk, run, swim, have fun.

programme.title: Raul
programme.desc: Raul and Birdie are best friends. Raul is an adorable green hippopotamus who loves to go on exciting adventures and Birdie is his side kick. These two lovable characters find themselves in all sort of situations as they journey around the countryside, but with each others help they will always find their way out of any problem.

programme.title: Dinoland
programme.desc: Go on adventures with four adorable baby dinosaurs as they explore their environment and work together to solve tricky problems. Helping young viewers to develop their initial problem solving and decision making skills as well as developing their social skills makes Dinoland the perfect combination of fun and learning. Make the most of these educational lessons with dinosaur puppets or soft toys.

programme.title: Toby McFly
programme.desc: This imaginative and creative childrens animation follows the adventures of Toby McFly, a canine aviator who presents us with a birds eye view of the world. After flying over many fascinating landscapes, active animals, busy people, and interesting places, Toby lands his aircraft and shows us, in detail, what we have just seen from above. The show is educational, stimulating, and informative as well as being fun and entertaining.

programme.title: Ducky and Fluffy
programme.desc: The Ducky family has a brand new member! With the arrival of her little brother Fluffy, Ducky experiences a wide range of new emotions and finds herself in new situations. Stories are created with the support of child psychologists to help children adjust to the arrival of a new sibling.

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Ristorante
programme.desc: Welcome to the Ristorante, come in and find out how the restaurant works. Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Sunville - Sportsville
programme.desc: Mister Goat, the Raccoon Family, Kitty Cat and the Friendly Pig are participating in Sports Day, and they want you to come along and join the fun! In doing so, not only will your child have lots of fun, but they will be exercising and developing basic coordination skills along the way. They will also increase muscle strength and sense of balance, which will keep them healthy and happy!

programme.title: World of Toys
programme.desc: Enter a world of games and experience with us fantastic adventures or exercise your fingers and conjure up some exquisite art jewellery. No manuals are needed to do this. Create your own special story and discover new possibilities how to spend a moment together.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo

This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. Developing babies proper shape-recognition from using vibrant colours a smooth transitions, Shaping Up combines educative aspects so that babies are able to develop their image recognition and creative skills.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy 2

programme.title: Sounds Around Us
programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. programme.title: ABC - duckBC

From A to Z, the five friends take children through the steps to produce beautiful letters and write wonderful words.

programme.title: Nature Dudes
programme.desc: Nature Dudes is a fun cartoon that helps its young viewers to learn about all things natural. They focus on teaching about identifying different animals, learning about their different habits and habitats. They also put a focus on seasons and the weather, helping its little viewers learn about rain and sunshine, in a fun and exciting way.

programme.title: Raul
programme.desc: Raul and Birdie are best friends. Raul is an adorable green hippopotamus who loves to go on exciting adventures and Birdie is his side kick. These two lovable characters find themselves in all sort of situations as they journey around the countryside, but with each others help they will always find their way out of any problem.

programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Didy Baby
programme.desc: Go on an adventure with a group of adorable baby animals in Didy Baby. The show teaches its tiny viewers social skills, and introduces them to problem solving and decision making.

programme.title: Nature Dudes
programme.desc: Nature Dudes is a fun cartoon that helps its young viewers to learn about all things natural. They focus on teaching about identifying different animals, learning about their different habits and habitats. They also put a focus on seasons and the weather, helping its little viewers learn about rain and sunshine, in a fun and exciting way.

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Join the friendly train conductor and adorable cartoon train as they go on magical journeys and gentle adventures, making sure all of their passengers get taken to the right place at the right time. The short stories are designed to teach your little ones about grouping and categories, using colour, shape, size and purpose to demonstrate this logical task.

programme.title: Forms Are Yours!
programme.desc: This wonderful and entertaining animated programme for babies and preschoolers reveals the amazing concept of contrast. Children are introduced to different shapes and colours through beautiful contrasting images and animations.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Forms Are Yours!

programme.title: Didy Baby

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Small - But Hardworking
programme.desc: Three elves build a variety of different objects with materials such as wood and ice. This show is designed to be both educational and entertaining. It advances childrens imagination, by stimulating their senses with a bright colourful cartoon. Objects coming to life also enhances the focus on promoting creative imagination. This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.desc: Living and playing in a beautiful house is so much fun, but Margo and Felix also have to be responsible in order to look after the house. Join these two best friend for creative thinking and lots of games!

programme.desc: Join the painter bear as he draws and paints friends for himself to play with. What are his painted friends today? The series is a perfect bedtime story to relax before going to bed. The bear helps to encourage imagination and develop basic visual and motor skills. A whole family can paint together for the perfect bonding activity of parents and children.

programme.title: Ristorante
programme.desc: Welcome to the Ristorante, come in and find out how the restaurant works. Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: World of Toys
programme.desc: Enter a world of games and experience with us fantastic adventures or exercise your fingers and conjure up some exquisite art jewellery. No manuals are needed to do this. Create your own special story and discover new possibilities how to spend a moment together.

programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.title: Space Adventures
programme.desc: In this childrens cartoon that focuses on animals and other imagined creatures travelling through space, children are encouraged to think creatively, and widen their vocabulary. Duck TV produces content that aids child development, that is both entertaining and educational. Children are encouraged to name objects, improving language, and its very creative, encouraging imaginative thinking.

programme.title: The Way We Travel
programme.desc: When viewing this cartoon, your child will watch various vehicles, which will, in turn, make them aware of a variety of different shapes and objects in the real world. They will also observe how they operate, which will allow them to grow an understanding of how they may be used in everyday life, as they see their different parts and hear the noises they make.

programme.title: Veggie-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Beaver Family
programme.desc: This cartoon is designed for very young children. It shows the relationships of a beaver family, and how they go about their everyday lives. This programme has educational benefits, as long as serving to keep young children entertained. This programme is designed to enhance social skills, and develop child-parent relationships, too. It also promotes interaction between parent and baby.

programme.title: Milo Dino
programme.desc: Following the adventures of a curious little dino boy in the Mesosoic era, as he discovers the world around him. Join Milo and his friends and family to find out how dinosaurs lived. The programme helps little children develop their social skills, as well as their imagination, introducing them to the era of dinosaurs.

programme.title: Doll Team to the Rescue
programme.desc: Bell and her trusty friends Fido the Kangaroo and Lilo the Bear come to the rescue in the forest for anybody that needs it! Doll Team to the Rescue teaches the importance of social skills, friendship and treating animals with love and respect.

programme.title: We Are Playing Now
programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: Bathroom
programme.desc: Join the little yellow duckling and her big elephant friend as they have endless fun splashing around in the Bathroom. Aimed at the littlest of viewers, this show includes the classic educational values of Duck TV, helping the development of motor skills and sensory activity. But most importantly, Bathroom helps it little viewers to befriend bath time, showing them how much fun a bath can be!

programme.title: The Way We Travel

They will also observe how they operate, which will allow them to grow an understanding of how they may be used in everyday life, as they see their different parts and hear the noises they make.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: An educational show which teaches children everything they need to know about all sorts of animals, ranging from a familiar domestic cat or even the wildest of tigers found in the deepest of wildernesses. The programme explores how each and every one of these animals behaves, eats and plays and compares those characteristics to those us humans adopt.

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: DuckSchool
programme.desc: In a forest kindergarden, woodland animals who call it their home are learning the basics of English from their helpful fairy teacher, Miss Sunshine. Learn some brand new words and practice your counting skills, or listen carefully to the stories Miss Sunshine has to tell. With Duckschool we can learn about so many things! There might even be some special guests to meet along the way.

programme.title: Pixie 2
programme.desc: Join Lilali, an elf magician. who just loves to perform his magic tricks. This programme, for very young viewers, can help little ones learn basic vocabulary. Watch with children and repeat the words of the objects on the screen to teach them short, simple words. After you have watched the programme you can repeat the vocabulary from the programme whilst playing to reinforce the words learnt.

programme.title: Little Melodies
programme.desc: This show encourages creativity, as you learn lots of fun new songs. This skill can be extended to everyday life; sing these songs at bedtime, in the car, on a walk, whenever! This sharpens the sense of hearing and nurtures any musical skills, aiding child development. This is a Duck TV production. Duck TV aim to produce content that is both educational and entertaining.

programme.title: Sippi Sappi

Aired on Duck TV Sippi Sappi is an all round fun way to get your little ones active and excited about sport.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. programme.title: Limitless
programme.desc: Limitless (2011) is an American thriller directed by Neil Burger and starring Bradley Cooper and Abbie Cornish. In order to get rid of bad luck, a writer named Eddie takes a secret drug called NZT. As a result, the guy can use 100 percent of his brain abilities and this changes his entire life. In a short time he makes a lot of money, but soon begins to suffer from the ominous side effects of the drug. And when Eddie tries to overcome his addiction, he finds out the terrible truth...

programme.title: This Day In History
programme.desc: This Day In History is a documentary series that looks back at historic events that took place on this day. We explore many different events that have had a lasting impact on society, whether in sport, politics, entertainment, art or science. Each episode is split into three parts, each featuring a short story about the event, letting viewers learn new English words and about fascinating pieces of history.

programme.title: Global Week-End
programme.desc: News stories as they happen. Analysis and coverage of the most important global events as they unfold providing insight into their significance and relevance for communities worldwide. From politics to society all that has an impact or will impact on the globe as a whole is presented in an accessible and insightful form to allow one to keep up-to-date on the factors changing the world we live in.

programme.title: Basketbol: Tekerlekli Sandalye Super Ligi
programme.desc: Tekerlekli Sandalye Basketbol Super Ligi, Turkiye Bedensel Engelliler Spor Federasyonu ( TBESF ) tarafından duzenlenen ve tekerlekli sandalye basketbolunda, Turkiyede en ust ligdir.

programme.title: Sportif
programme.desc: Fenerbahçe spor takımlarını tum yonleriyle ekranlara getiren "Sportif" programı FB TV ekranlarında yayınlanıyor. Futboldan voleybola, atletizmden yuzmeye kadar her alanda faaliyet gosteren Fenerbahçenin Turk sporuna olan katkıları değerlendiriliyor.

programme.title: Haber
programme.desc: Turkiyede ve dunyada yaşanan onemli gelişmelerin ayrıntıları izleyiciye taşınıyor. Siyasetten ekonomiye, spordan sanata, gundemi oluşturan haberlerin aktarıldığı programda, hava-yol durumu guncellemeleri de ekrana taşınıyor.

programme.title: Yarının Yıldızları
programme.desc: Fenerbahçenin tum yaş gruplarında yapılan çift kale maçlardan Yarının Yıldızlarında takip edin.

programme.desc: Futbol dunyanın en onemli yan çizgisidir. En son spor haberlerini kaçırmayın. Guncel ile ilgili haber sonuçları FB TVda. Maçla ilgili en onemli yorumları ve olayları ekranlarınızda sunarız.

programme.title: Haber

programme.title: Super Yıldızlar
programme.desc: Super Lig futbolcularının en iyi başarıları hakkında bir program. En çekici hamleler, savunmalar ve goller... Sadece FB TVde

programme.title: Basketbol: Super Lig
programme.desc: Turk basketbolunun başlangıcı, ligin 1966da kurulmasından çok oncelere dayanmaktadır. Turkiyede bowling 20. yuzyılın başlarında biliniyordu. 1904 yılında İstanbuldaki Robert Kolej oğrencileri bu takım sporunun cazibesini ilk kez keşfettiler. Ligin kuruluşundan bir yıl sonra, en iyi Turk basketbol kuluplerinin ilk resmi yarışması başladı.

programme.title: Basketbol: Kadınlar Super Ligi
programme.desc: Basketbol Super Ligi, sponsorluk adıyla ING Basketbol Super Ligi, 1966 yılında Turkiye Basketbol Federasyonu tarafından kurulan ve Turkiyedeki en ust duzey profesyonel basketbol ligi. Normal lig karşılamaları, 16 takım arasında, her takımın biri kendi sahasında diğeri rakip takımın sahasında olmak uzere deplasmanlı, iki devreli ve lig usulu oynanır.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Barry Josephson ve Hart Hanson’ın yapımcılığı ile Angel dizisinden tanıdığımız David Boreanaz’ın başrolde olduğu Bones, gerçek hayattan esinlenilerek çekilmiş bir drama. Bir antropolog ve roman yazarı olan Dr. Temperance Brennan, Jeffersonian Institution’da, kurbanların kemiklerini inceleyerek cinayetleri çozumlemeye çalışıyor. Kimlik belirlemede standart metotlar işe yaramaz olduğunda, adli tıp ekipleri Brennan’dan yardım istiyor. Özel ajan Seeley Booth ile profosyonel bir ekip gibi çalışsalar da, ilk gunden beri aralarındaki kimya apaçık ortada. Cinayet çozumlerinde son teknolojileri kullanarak ilerleyen bu ekibin maceraları, oldukça etkileyici.

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Sevgilisinden yeni ayrılan Jess, uç erkekle birlikte aynı eve taşınmak zorunda kalır. İnsan ilişkilerinde pek başarılı olamayan Jess, evde geçirdiği sure içerisinde hem kendini geliştirme fırsatı bulacak, hem de erkeklerin dunyasını yakından tanıyacaktır.

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Sevgilisinden yeni ayrılan Jess, uç erkekle birlikte aynı eve taşınmak zorunda kalır. İnsan ilişkilerinde pek başarılı olamayan Jess, evde geçirdiği sure içerisinde hem kendini geliştirme fırsatı bulacak, hem de erkeklerin dunyasını yakından tanıyacaktır.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Bir suçluyu en kestirme yoldan nasıl yakalarsınız? Tabii ki bir suçlu gibi duşunerek ve onun psikolojisine gore hareket edip, ipuçlarını birleştirerek. Virginia Quanticodaki Davranış Analizi Ünitesinde çalışan ozel bir ekibin uzmanlık alanı suçlu beyinleri analiz etmek. Onların işi, suç mahalli ya da laboratuvar deneyleri ile bitmiyor, her bir karmaşık davayı çozerken yap-boz parçalarını birleştiriyorlar.

Virginia Quanticodaki Davranış Analizi Ünitesinde çalışan ozel bir ekibin uzmanlık alanı suçlu beyinleri analiz etmek. Onların işi, suç mahalli ya da laboratuvar deneyleri ile bitmiyor, her bir karmaşık davayı çozerken yap-boz parçalarını birleştiriyorlar.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Bir suçluyu en kestirme yoldan nasıl yakalarsınız? Tabii ki bir suçlu gibi duşunerek ve onun psikolojisine gore hareket edip, ipuçlarını birleştirerek. programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Barry Josephson ve Hart Hanson’ın yapımcılığı ile Angel dizisinden tanıdığımız David Boreanaz’ın başrolde olduğu Bones, gerçek hayattan esinlenilerek çekilmiş bir drama. Bir antropolog ve roman yazarı olan Dr. Temperance Brennan, Jeffersonian Institution’da, kurbanların kemiklerini inceleyerek cinayetleri çozumlemeye çalışıyor. Kimlik belirlemede standart metotlar işe yaramaz olduğunda, adli tıp ekipleri Brennan’dan yardım istiyor. Özel ajan Seeley Booth ile profosyonel bir ekip gibi çalışsalar da, ilk gunden beri aralarındaki kimya apaçık ortada. Cinayet çozumlerinde son teknolojileri kullanarak ilerleyen bu ekibin maceraları, oldukça etkileyici.

programme.title: How i Met Your Mother
programme.desc: How I Met Your Mother, Ted (Josh Radnor) ve nasıl aşık olduğu ile ilgili bir komedi. Her şey Ted’in en yakın arkadaşı Marshall’ın (Jason Segel) uzun suredir birlikte olduğu anaokulu oğretmeni kız arkadaşı Lily’e (Alsyson Hannigan) evlenme teklif etmeye karar vermesiyle başlıyor. Gerçek aşkı bulmayı umut eden Ted’e, tescilli bekar arkadaşı Barney (Neil Patrick Harris), çılgın ve arsız yontemleriyle, kadınlarla tanıştırarak yardımcı olmaya çalışıyor. Ted, Robin (Cobie Smulders) ile tanışıyor ve bunun ilk goruşte aşık olduğuna oldukça emin. Fakat kaderin Ted için farklı planları var.

programme.title: The Artful Dodger
programme.desc: Jack ve Belle, sarhoş profesorun başarısız girişiminin ardından Tinklerı ameliyat eder. Gaines uzaktayken, Dodger ve Fagin 500 altını çalmayı ummaktadır. Av sırasında Dariusun sırrını oğrenirler. Jack ve Belle, Tinklerı olumcul bir enfeksiyondan kurtarmaya çalışır.

programme.title: Tales of the Walking Dead
programme.desc: Tales of the Walking Dead, orijinal dizinin dunyasında geçen hem yeni hem de eski karakterlere odaklanan, bağımsız bolumleri olan bir antoloji dizisidir. Dizide, kıyametten aylar ve yıllar sonra karakterlerin aylakların dehşetiyle nasıl başa çıktığını keşfedeceğiz. Her bolumde kişilerarası çatışmaları, imkansızlıkların ustesinden gelme becerilerini test edecek ve hayatta kalma mucadelelerine tanıklık edeceğiz.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Dokuzuncu sezonda, savaşın bitmesinin uzerinden geçen 1.5 seneden sonra, hayatta kalanlar Rickin liderliğinde bir medeniyet kurmaya çalışmaktadırlar. Ancak hiçbir şey, onları, karşılarına çıkacak olan guce hazırlayabilecek gibi değildir.

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Old Man
programme.desc: Dan Chasein geçmişi yakasına yapıştığında, otuz yıldır evi olarak gorduğu kasabadan kaçmak zorunda kalır.

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Tracker
programme.desc: Colter, Arkansasın taşra bolgesinde arabaları yol kenarında terk edilmiş hâlde bulunan kayıp bir ailenin garip bir şekilde ortadan kayboluşunu araştırırken, annenin geçmişiyle ilgili şok edici bir şey oğrenir ve bu, onu organize suç dunyasına goturur. Ayrıca, Reenie yeni hukuk burosunu açar ve işlerini yoluna koymak için Velmadan yardım ister.

programme.title: Will Trent
programme.desc: Will Trent’in ikinci sezonunda, Georgia Soruşturma Burosu’ndan (GBI) Özel Ajan Will Trent, ortağı Faith Mitchell ile birlikte karmaşık cinayetleri ve suç olaylarını araştırırken, geçmişine dair sırlar da yavaş yavaş açığa çıkar.

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Sevgilisinden yeni ayrılan Jess, uç erkekle birlikte aynı eve taşınmak zorunda kalır. İnsan ilişkilerinde pek başarılı olamayan Jess, evde geçirdiği sure içerisinde hem kendini geliştirme fırsatı bulacak, hem de erkeklerin dunyasını yakından tanıyacaktır.

programme.desc: Sevgilisinden yeni ayrılan Jess, uç erkekle birlikte aynı eve taşınmak zorunda kalır. İnsan ilişkilerinde pek başarılı olamayan Jess, evde geçirdiği sure içerisinde hem kendini geliştirme fırsatı bulacak, hem de erkeklerin dunyasını yakından tanıyacaktır.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Bir suçluyu en kestirme yoldan nasıl yakalarsınız? Tabii ki bir suçlu gibi duşunerek ve onun psikolojisine gore hareket edip, ipuçlarını birleştirerek. Virginia Quanticodaki Davranış Analizi Ünitesinde çalışan ozel bir ekibin uzmanlık alanı suçlu beyinleri analiz etmek. Onların işi, suç mahalli ya da laboratuvar deneyleri ile bitmiyor, her bir karmaşık davayı çozerken yap-boz parçalarını birleştiriyorlar.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Barry Josephson ve Hart Hanson’ın yapımcılığı ile Angel dizisinden tanıdığımız David Boreanaz’ın başrolde olduğu Bones, gerçek hayattan esinlenilerek çekilmiş bir drama. Bir antropolog ve roman yazarı olan Dr. Temperance Brennan, Jeffersonian Institution’da, kurbanların kemiklerini inceleyerek cinayetleri çozumlemeye çalışıyor. Kimlik belirlemede standart metotlar işe yaramaz olduğunda, adli tıp ekipleri Brennan’dan yardım istiyor. Özel ajan Seeley Booth ile profosyonel bir ekip gibi çalışsalar da, ilk gunden beri aralarındaki kimya apaçık ortada. Cinayet çozumlerinde son teknolojileri kullanarak ilerleyen bu ekibin maceraları, oldukça etkileyici.

programme.title: Godfather of Harlem
programme.desc: Club St. Clair açılır ama Bumpy, Colomboya odeme yapmalıdır. Frank koruma peşindedir. Mayme mali bir engele takılır.

programme.title: Tracker
programme.desc: Colter kayıp bir babayı aradığı sırada aniden ortadan kaybolunca, Reenie yardım etmesi için Colterın kardeşi Russellı (Jensen Ackles) yanına alır.

programme.title: The Artful Dodger
programme.desc: Jack ve Belle, sarhoş profesorun başarısız girişiminin ardından Tinklerı ameliyat eder. Gaines uzaktayken, Dodger ve Fagin 500 altını çalmayı ummaktadır. Av sırasında Dariusun sırrını oğrenirler. Jack ve Belle, Tinklerı olumcul bir enfeksiyondan kurtarmaya çalışır.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Sert geçen kışın ardından hayatta kalan ekibimiz İlkbahar’ın gelişiyle, Fısıldayanlar’ın bolgesine girmeye cesaret ediyor. Birleşen topluluklar Alfa’nın korkunç guç gosterisinin etkileriyle başa çıkmaya çalışırken, olulerle dolu bir dunyada medeniyetin hayatta kalabilmesi için savaşmak zorundadır.

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Tales of the Walking Dead
programme.desc: Tales of the Walking Dead, orijinal dizinin dunyasında geçen hem yeni hem de eski karakterlere odaklanan, bağımsız bolumleri olan bir antoloji dizisidir. Dizide, kıyametten aylar ve yıllar sonra karakterlerin aylakların dehşetiyle nasıl başa çıktığını keşfedeceğiz. Her bolumde kişilerarası çatışmaları, imkansızlıkların ustesinden gelme becerilerini test edecek ve hayatta kalma mucadelelerine tanıklık edeceğiz.

programme.title: Haber Bulteni

programme.title: Airport
programme.desc: Havacılık ve turizm programı Airportta, Turkiye ve dunya sivil hava teknolojisindeki gelişmeler, yeni teknolojiler, hizmetler ve urunler hakkında bilgi veriliyor. Sivil havacılık kuruluşlarının yoneticileriyle soyleşiler gerçekleştiriliyor.Guntay Şimşekin hazırladığı program, havayolu şirketleri, havalimanı işletmecileri ve yer hizmetleri firmalarının çalışmalarını ekrana taşıyor.

programme.title: Burası Hafta Sonu
programme.desc: Canlı bağlantılar, sıcak haberler, Turkiye ve dunya gundeminin satır aralarındaki çarpıcı detaylar, her hafta çok ozel isimlerle gundem oluşturacak ve çok konuşulacak sohbetler... Hepsi Ela Rumeysa Cebecinin sunumuyla Burası Hafta Sonunda ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Mucize Hayat
programme.desc: Prof. Dr. Engin Çakar ile Mucize Hayat, Haberturk TVde sağlık dolu sohbetlerle izleyiciyle buluşuyor.Bel ağrısı için ekipmansız beş egzersizi uzmanlar studyoda gosteriyor. Beyin hasarı vakaları yazın neden artıyor? Suya balıklama atlamak beyinde hangi hasarlara yol açıyor? Uzm. Dr. Selvinaz Edizer anlatıyor.Aşı, menenjitte ne kadar koruyucu? Menenjitin kesin çozumu var mı? Uzm. Dr. Pınar Karadeniz yanıtlıyor.

programme.title: Haber Bulteni

programme.title: HT Sinema
programme.desc: Haftanın vizyon filmlerinin kritiği, dijital platformların one çıkan yapımları, sinema dunyasının nabzı HT Sinemada tutuluyor.Lilo ve Stiç animasyonu neden bu kadar seviliyor? 2000li yılların en iyi beş romantik komedi filmi... Sinema Yazarı Mehmet Açar ve Kadir Kaymakçının sunum ve yorumlarıyla HT Sinemada sizleri bekliyor.

programme.title: Yolun Başındayken
programme.desc: Gorkem İldaş ile Yolun Başındayken oğrencilere ve ailelere rehberlik ediyor, eğitim ve gençlerin gundemini ekrana taşıyor.Sınavlar artık geride kaldı; şimdi sıra tercihlerde! Adayların onunde en az sınav kadar kritik bir donem var.Eğitimciler Zerrin Akınlı ve Mikail Erguven, sınav sonrası değerlendirmelerini canlı yayında aktarıyor. Hem YKS hem LGS tercihlerinde nelere dikkat edilmeli? Eğitimci Murat Boğa, doğru tercih için izleyicilere onemli ipuçları sunuyor.

programme.title: Cengiz Markal İle Doğa ve Yaşam
Gonulden Dile
programme.desc: Kanal 23 ekranlarında yayınlanan "Gonulden Dile" ile Elazığın, tarihi, sanatı, kulturu, efsaneleri bu programda konuşuluyor. Ahmet Bulutun sunumuyla "Gonulden Dile" her Pazar saat 11.00de Kanal 23 ekranlarında. Sakın kaçırmayın!

programme.title: Kırmızı Koltuk
programme.desc: Her hafta Turkiyenin tanınmış ve onemli isimlerini ağırlayan Kırmızı Koltuk programımızda, ilham verici hayat hikayelerini, başarı sırlarını ve gundemdeki konulara dair samimi sohbetleri izleyebilirsiniz. Ünlu konuklarımızın deneyimlerinden faydalanmak ve merak ettiğiniz sorulara yanıt bulmak için bizi takip edin!

programme.title: Masum
programme.desc: Birbirlerinden tamamen zıt olan iki kuzen Gopi ve Rashinin hikayesinin anlatıldığı Masum saflığı, sevgiyi ve gerçek aşkı izleyicisine hissettirecek. Gopinin ailesi olunce dayısı onu evlatlık alır ve onu oz çocuklarından ayırmaz. Gopi, sevecen kalbiyle herkesin dikkatini çeker.

programme.title: Kanal 7de Sabah
programme.desc: Gune hoş bir başlangıç yapmak ve gunceli yakalamak istiyorsanız hafta boyunca ekrana gelen Kanal 7de Sabahı sakın kaçırmayın.

programme.title: Elif
programme.desc: Macera dolu sahneleriyle soluk soluğa izlenen Elifte Melek nihayet kızına kavuşur. Uzun uğraşlar sonucu birbirini Haktanırlar konağında bulan Melek ve Elif konaktan ayrılmaya karar verir. Tam konaktan ayrılacakları esnada Tarıkın adamı onları yakalar ve Meleki vurur. Elifi kaçırmak uzereyken Melek mudahale eder ve kızını adamın elinden kurtarır. Elifi de alıp kimsenin bilmediği bir yerde yeni bir hayat kurmak isteyen Melek izini kaybettirmeyi başarır.

programme.title: Nursaçanla Sohbetler
programme.desc: Cumartesi sabahları Nursaçanla Sohbetler ile taçlanıyor. İslamiyeti hakkıyla yaşayabilmek için akıllara takılan soruların yanıt bulduğu Nursaçanla Sohbetlerde Hz. Muhammedin Muslumanlara oğutleri, ahiret hayatının bilinmeyenleri, ahirette yaşanacağı belirtilen hadiseler ve insan ilişkilerinde dikkat edilmesi gereken noktalara yer veriliyor.

programme.title: TV Filmi
programme.desc: Çeşitli film turleri veya dizileri aracılığıyla onumuzdeki dakikalarda eğlenecek ve rahatlayacaksınız. Filmler ve diziler, hem genç hem de yaşlı izleyiciler için, hepimiz için gosterilir.

programme.title: Dunyanın Tadı
programme.desc: Dunya mutfaklarından farklı lezzetlerin ve yemek kulturlerinin ekrana taşındığı Dunyanın Tadı, Yasin Esirgençin sunumuyla izleyiciyle buluşuyor. İlginç yemek alışkanlıkları, birbirinden farklı lezzetler ve eşi benzeri gorulmemiş yiyecekler Dunyanın Tadında ekrana getiriliyor.

programme.title: Kanal 7 Hafta Sonu Haberleri
programme.desc: Hulya Seloninin sunduğu Haftasonu Haberlerinde, bir haftada, Turkiye ve dunyada yaşanan gelişmeler, son dakika haberleri, ozel dosyalar ve birbirinden ilginç haberler yer alıyor. Turkiye ve dunya gundeminde yaşananları ve haftaya damgasını vuran olayları uzman konukların da bakış açısıyla gormek istiyorsanız Hulya Seloniyle Haftasonu Haberlerini sakın kaçırmayın...

programme.title: Gunduz Gece
programme.desc: Sevilen turkucu Kurşatın eğlenceli sunumuyla Anadolunun saklı kalmış guzelliklerini ekrana getiren Gunduz Gece turuna hız kesmeden gezmeye devam ediyor. Memleket hasreti çekenlerin ozlemini dindirmek isteyen Gunduz Gece, Anadolu topraklarının guzelliklerini karış karış dolaşarak Kanal 7de ekrana taşıyor.

programme.title: Dunyayı Geziyorum
programme.desc: Milyarlarca insanın oluşturduğu farklı kulturler, farklı yaşamlar Dunyayı Geziyorum ile meraklılarıyla buluşuyor. Gezmeye gormeye fırsat bulamayanlar için dunyanın dort bir yanını ekrana taşıyan Özlem Tunca ve minik oğlu Yakupcan izleyicilerini dunya turuna çıkarıyor.

programme.title: Kanal 7 Hafta Sonu Haberleri
programme.desc: Hulya Seloninin sunduğu Haftasonu Haberlerinde, bir haftada, Turkiye ve dunyada yaşanan gelişmeler, son dakika haberleri, ozel dosyalar ve birbirinden ilginç haberler yer alıyor. programme.title: Masum

programme.title: Yargı
programme.desc: Ilgaz, kendisine bir cinayet vakası olarak getirilen; çop konteynırında bulunan bir kadına ait cesedin, ailesine vurduğu sarsıcı darbeye hazırlıksız yakalanır. Kardeşi Çınar bu dosyanın baş zanlısı olarak gorulmektedir. Ilgaz’ın kardeşini kurtarmak için iyi bir avukata ihtiyacı vardır, bu yuzden zorlu bir kararın eşiğine gelir. Avukat Ceylin ve Savcı Ilgaz; buluşacaklarını hiç ummadıkları bu donum noktasında, bugune kadar vazgeçilmez sandıkları doğrularını sorgularken; aynı zamanda kendilerini yuzmeyi bilmedikleri bir sırlar denizinde çırpınırken bulacaklardır.

programme.title: Poyraz Karayel
programme.desc: Aşkın ve nefretin, dostluğun ve duşmanlığın, iyiliğin ve kotuluğun en uçlarda yaşandığı bir hikaye...

programme.title: Kavak Yelleri
programme.desc: Mutlu ve guvenli ailesinden kopup kendi yolunu bulmaya, buyumeye çalışan Deniz; idealist, guçlu, maddi zorluklara rağmen okuyan, hayata karşı sert gorunmeye çalışan hassas Aslı; rahat ve esprili tavırlarıyla içindeki acıyı saklamaya çalışan Efe. Ve ayrık otu, isyankar Mine. Bu dort gencin sıkı dostlukları, ilk aşkları, okulda yaşadıkları, aşmaya çalıştıkları aile sorunları hepimize tanıdık gelecek.

programme.title: Konuştukça
programme.desc: Sunuculuğunu Özlem Yıldız yaptığı programda sağlıktan doğal yaşama, guzellikten kişisel bakıma, eğitimden psikolojiye kadar her şey konuşuluyor.

programme.title: Magazin D Cumartesi
programme.desc: Ünlulerin en ozel sırları, hiçbir yerde izleyemeyeceğiniz roportajlar, magazin dunyasındaki en son gelişmeler ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Ardanın Mutfağı
programme.desc: Ünlu şef Arda Turkmen; kendine has uslubu, sunum tarzı ve yiyecek içecek sektorundeki deneyimlerini, hazırladığı birbirinden lezzetli yemekler eşliğinde izleyicilerle paylaşıyor.

programme.title: Mahrumlar
programme.desc: Hiç kimseleri olmayan bu iki kardeş gerçekten de mahrumdur. Gunluk işlerle uğraşarak genelde gunu kurtarırlar, çoğunlukla kafalarına eseni yapmalarıyla meşhurdurlar. Kutlunun Tanem adında sevdiği bir kız vardır ve ailesinin onu başkasına vermek istemesiyle iki kardeşin seruveni başlar.

programme.title: Kuralsız Sokaklar
programme.desc: Kuralsız Sokaklar ilk bolumunde Latin Amerika ulkesi Brezilyanın Sao Paulo şehrinin arka sokaklarına, çetelerden izin almadan girilemeyen mahallelerine giriyor.

programme.title: Kanal D Ana Haber
programme.desc: Gundemin nabzının tutulduğu ve son dakika gelişmelerinin ekrana aktarıldığı Kanal D Haber Haftasonu, Merve Dinçkolun sunumuyla ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Kuzeyin Oğlu Volkan Konak
programme.desc: Turk halkının gonlunde taht kuran şarkıları, şahsına munhasır yorumculuğu, şairane ruhundan dokulen şiirleri ve hayatımıza dokunan hikâyeleriyle her zaman kalplerde yaşayacak olan Volkan Konakın efsaneleşen programı geri donuyor. Birbirinden unlu isimlerin konuk olduğu Kuzeyin Oğlu, en beğenilen bolumleriyle yeniden izleyiciyle buluşuyor.

programme.title: Çember: Karanlığın Gozleri
programme.desc: Üniversite araştırma gorevlisi olan Prof. Dr. Sinan Demirhan evinde ailesiyle birlikteyken saldırıya uğrar. Olay yerinde kanlar yazılmış şifreli mesajlar bulunur. Karısı ve kızı olurken saldırıdan ağır yaralı olarak kurtulan profesor yoğun bakımda uyutulur. Bir yandan Tubitak’tan gelen bir kriptoloji uzmanının yardımıyla şifreleri çozmeye çalışırken, diğer yandan profesorun kendi urettiği enerjiyle giden bir araç prototipi uzerinde çalıştığını oğrenen ozel birim polisleri, kendilerini inanılmaz bir komplonun ortasında bulurlar.

programme.title: Muzik Arası
programme.desc: Sevilen sanatçıların video klipleri ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Magazin D Pazar
programme.desc: Ünlulerin en ozel sırları, hiçbir yerde izleyemeyeceğiniz roportajlar, magazin dunyasındaki en son gelişmeler ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Evrim Akın İle Ev Gezmesi
programme.desc: Renkli kişiliği ve hoş sohbeti ile izleyicilerin her daim beğenisini kazanan Evrim Akın, birbirinden unlu isimlerin evlerini gezerek çok ozel yaşantılarına tanık oluyor. Yaşam alanlarını çok merak ettiğimiz magazin dunyasının en sevilen isimlerinin evdeki yaşantılarına, mutfaklarına, salonlarına, giyinme odalarına konuk olmaya hazır mısınız?

programme.title: Arda ile Omuz Omuza
programme.desc: Ünlu isimler, Arda Turkmen’in yardımıyla mutfak performanslarının gozler onune seriyor.

programme.title: Password
programme.desc: Şebnem Bozoklunun sunuculuğunu, Enis Arıkanın daimi yarışmacılığını ustlendiği programın konuğu başarılı oyuncu ve son donemdeki sosyal medya paylaşımlarıyla dikkat çeken Nurgul Yeşilçay.

programme.title: Arka Sokaklar
programme.desc: Ayşecanı koz olarak kullanan Cevher ekibe zarar vermek istemektedir. Ama işler duşunduğu gibi gitmeyince planını değiştirir. Adnan Baki uzerinden once Gokçeye sonra da Seline ulaşacaktır. Acılı anne Selin kızı soz konusu olduğunda Mesutu bile gozu gormeyecek duruma gelecektir.

programme.title: 99. Gazi Koşusu
programme.desc: Turkiye Cumhuriyetinin kurucusu Mustafa Kemal Ataturkun anısını yaşatmak amacıyla 1927 yılından bu yana aralıksız olarak duzenlenen Gazi Koşusu, 99uncu kez start almaya hazırlanıyor.

programme.title: Kanal D Ana Haber

programme.title: Uçuş Planı
programme.desc: Yakınlarını kaybetmenin uzuntusunu yaşayan Kyle Pratt, yanında kuçuk kızı Julieyle beraber Berlinden ABDye doğru yola çıkar. Sessiz sakin başlayan yolculuğun bir noktasında uyukalan Kyle, kuçuk kızının ortadan kaybolduğunu fark eder. Telaşlanır ve çevresindekiler ile murettebattan yardım ister. Ancak uçaktaki kimse kızın varlığını bile hatırlamaz ve Kyleın akıl sağlığından şuphe etmeye başlarlar. Bunun uzerine Kyle annelik içgudulerine dinleyerek uçağı birbirine katar.

programme.title: İrem Aktaş ile Hafta Sonu Sabah
İrem Aktaş ile Hafta Sonu Haber
İrem Aktaş ile Hafta Sonu Sabah
